Articles.Content: I installed Precise node 1.4.1 but when I made a maneuver node nothing pops up. Not sure this is part of the mod but I do have a warp button on my apo and per which I didn't have before. KSP is ver. 1.4.4.2215 if that helps. I also have betterburn kerbal engineer, kerbal alarm clock and scansat.

I'm 99% sure you forgot to install 'ClickThroughBlocker', which is required for precise node to run

You should always check for dependencies in the mod description/forum post.

 

If I'm wrong, please upload a log file

Edited July 24, 2018 by 4x4cheesecake

On 7/23/2018 at 7:47 PM, TheAngryHulk said:

I installed Precise node 1.4.1 but when I made a maneuver node nothing pops up. Not sure this is part of the mod but I do have a warp button on my apo and per which I didn't have before. KSP is ver. 1.4.4.2215 if that helps. I also have betterburn kerbal engineer, kerbal alarm clock and scansat.

1.4.4 broke a lot of mods....1.4.5 is coming out soon, but I don't know that it will fix that.

I'd tell you to roll back to 1.4.3 via the beta tab in Steam, but that might make any saves you opened in 1.4.4 incompatible including your persistent save....so don't do it unless you have backup saves of a point you are willing to go back to....or a manual save that you are willing to roll back to that you haven't loaded since 1.4.4...

For now so you at least have regular maneuver nodes, I'd just uninstall precise node....

You could try "Precise Maneuver" or "Astrogator" instead....they are similar but different to Precise node and claim to be compatible up to version 1.4.99 and 1.4.8 respectively....
